description: The Phoenicians established a commercial outpost at Tripolis (Tripoli) in the ninth century BC. An independent city during the Hellenistic period, Tripolis came under Roman control in 64 BC.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tarabulus/Tripoli LEB
